block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: 结果将是一个浮点数 使用 round() 转换为整数 the result will be a floating number use round() to convert to integer
模拟输入为 0 - 4095 使用公式转换为我们想要的输出 analog input is 0 - 4095 use a formula to convert to the output we want
使用力传感器测试你的力量！:) Use a force sensor to test your strength! :)
